text: Philip Kenneth Collen (born 8 December 1957) is an English guitarist and singer-songwriter. He is the lead guitarist for the rock band Def Leppard, joining the band in 1982 during the recording of the Pyromania album, replacing Pete Willis.35 Years Ago: Def Leppard Replaces Pete Willis With Phil Collen at Ultimate Classic Rock; by Martin Kielty; July 2017 He was born in London. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:English rock guitarists Category:Heavy metal musicians Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from London Category:Writers from London Category:Singers from London Category:Def Leppard members
title: Phil Collen
